typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{CR:MRData} as ({@limit} as short, {@offset} as boolean, {@series} as string, {@total} as short, {@url} as string, {CR:CircuitTable} as ({CR:Circuit} as ({@circuitId} as string, {@url} as string, {CR:CircuitName} as string, {CR:Location} as ({@lat} as double, {@long} as double, {CR:Country} as string, {CR:Locality} as string))[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'formula1',
	folderPath: 'RAW',
	fileName: 'circuits.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['http://ergast.com/mrd/1.4'->'F1']) ~> XMLFromADLS2
XMLFromADLS2 foldDown(unroll(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCircuit
